title: alpha client icon
body: I haven't received my icon despite logging into the alpha multiple times

replies.body: The icon will likely start distributing on the 15th of November, so if you don't have the icon by the 29th of this month, just let me know and I can follow up on it for you.

Hey there.

I was an alpha tester too, once I logged in the alpha client icon vanished from my desktop. I still have yet to receive the icon as well and it is the 16th of November currently. Any thoughts on this matter?
Icons are expected to be distributed until November 29, so hang tight. I haven't gotten mine either! If you don't have it by the 29th, please submit a ticket to Riot Games Support.

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=eJQv9TuA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-11T11:25:29.756+0000)
>
> The icon will likely start distributing on the 15th of November, so if you don't have the icon by the 29th of this month, just let me know and I can follow up on it for you.

Thank you for being an alpha tester! The alpha tester icon may take a few days to appear in your account. If you haven't received the icon by November 15, please let us know and we'll investigate further.

Today(15th) is the last day of distribution not the start, and nope I haven't received it yet so will have to check tomorrow

were you an alpha tester? 
if yes, i haven't received mine either
